src:
Round-Up 5 Berita Terpopuler
Tarif Tol Jagorawi & Dalkot Mau Naik, Ini Besarannya
05 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Tol dalam kota/Foto: Hasan Al Habshy

Jakarta - Berita terpopuler detikFinance, Selasa (5/11/2019) adalah tarif Tol Jagorawi dan Tol Dalam Kota (Dalkot) yang segera naik. Kemungkinan tarif kedua ruas tol itu akan naik jelang tutup tahun ini.Selain itu, menurut PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk selaku opertor, besaran kenaikan antara 6-7% dari tarif saat ini. Menurut Corporate Finance Group Head Jasa Marga Eka Setya Adrianto kisaran 6-7% itu mengacu pada laju inflasi di DKI Jakarta.Mau tahu informasi selengkapnya? Baca 5 berita detikFinance terpopuler berikut ini: (eds/hns)
text:
Round-Up of 5 Most Popular News
Jagorawi & Dalkot Toll Rates Want to Rise, This is the Amount
05 Nov 2019, 2:00 PM by Eduardo Simorangkir


Toll in the city / Photo: Hasan Al Habshy

Jakarta - detikFinance's most popular news, Tuesday (11/05/2019) is Jagorawi Toll and City Toll (Dalkot) Toll Road tariffs which are soon rising. It is likely that the tariffs of the two toll roads will rise ahead of closing this year. In addition, according to PT Jasa Marga (Persero) Tbk as the opertor, the magnitude of the increase is between 6-7% of the current tariff. According to Jasa Marga Corporate Finance Group Head Eka Setya Adrianto, the 6-7% range refers to the inflation rate in DKI Jakarta. Do you want to know more information? Read the 5 most popular detikFinance news below: (eds / hns)
